is_fixed_price.description: Filter by pricing availability: true = products offering fixed pricing (at least one option with fixed_price), false = products offering auction pricing (at least one option without fixed_price). Products with both fixed and auction options match both true and false.

standard_formats_only.description: Only return products accepting IAB standard formats

min_exposures.description: Minimum exposures/impressions needed for measurement validity

start_date.description: Campaign start date (ISO 8601 date format: YYYY-MM-DD) for availability checks

end_date.description: Campaign end date (ISO 8601 date format: YYYY-MM-DD) for availability checks

budget_range.description: Budget range to filter appropriate products

countries.description: Filter by country coverage using ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes (e.g., ['US', 'CA', 'GB']). Works for all inventory types.

regions.description: Filter by region coverage using ISO 3166-2 codes (e.g., ['US-NY', 'US-CA', 'GB-SCT']). Use for locally-bound inventory (regional OOH, local TV) where products have region-specific coverage.

metros.description: Filter by metro coverage for locally-bound inventory (radio, DOOH, local TV). Use when products have DMA/metro-specific coverage. For digital inventory where products have broad coverage, use required_geo_targeting instead to filter by seller capability.

code.description: Metro code within the system (e.g., '501' for NYC DMA)

required_axe_integrations.description: Filter to products executable through specific agentic ad exchanges. URLs are canonical identifiers.

required_features.description: Filter to products from sellers supporting specific protocol features. Only features set to true are used for filtering.

required_geo_targeting.description: Filter to products from sellers supporting specific geo targeting capabilities. Each entry specifies a targeting level (country, region, metro, postal_area) and optionally a system for levels that have multiple classification systems.

level.description: Geographic targeting level (country, region, metro, postal_area)

system.description: Classification system within the level. Required for metro (e.g., 'nielsen_dma') and postal_area (e.g., 'us_zip'). Not applicable for country/region which use ISO standards.
